attributes.action: Revoke bankers bonuses to support our soldiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bankers who are supported by the british tax payer should be made to donate there bonuses to our injured soldiers. This money will go to help the rehabilitation and give financial support in getting them back to as good a life as possible. MPS should do the same with the expencies they owe the country. This action would prove that both bankers and MPS think of others as well.
